title.en: Children of Abraham and True Freedom

en: Jesus spoke to those who believed him about truth and freedom.
The discussion turned to Abraham and what it means to belong to God.

label.en: The Truth Will Set You Free

lines: Then you will know the truth,
and the truth will set you free.”
How can you say we shall be set free?”
“Everyone who sins is a slave to sin.
If the Son sets you free,
you would do the things Abraham did.
I have told you the truth that I heard from God.”

question.en: What do you think Jesus means by true freedom—and how does he connect this to Abraham?
